metadata.title: Miss Mary Of Sweden Flora Women's Unpadded Underwired Lace Bra with Embroidery
features: SUPPORTIVE: This under-wired, full-cup bra offers optimal support and comfort all day while providing full coverage. The luxurious charmeuse fabric and comfort fit provide good support and lift for the bust and a round shape, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions.
BEST FIT: To ensure the best fit, be sure to first take your measurements and find your bra size using the Miss Mary size guide. We offer women comfortable bras with great support.
WIDE SHOULDER STRAPS: The padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not dig into the skin and add comfort. Our straps are designed to decrease the risk of red marks and chafing.

COMFORTABLE FABRIC BLEND: This comfort bra is light and flexible. 59% polyamide, 30% polyester, and 11% elastane material give it a microfiber feeling that's soft against the skin, adding both great support and comfort.
OUR MISSION: As experts in comfortable womenâ€™s underwear since 1957, we at Miss Mary bring you products that combine timeless design with top craftsmanship.
description: We at Miss Mary believe that lingerie for women should be comfortable as well as beautiful. This is a comfortable bra with a striking design of exclusive floral embroidery. This full coverage bra provide maximum comfort, making it perfect for everyday wear and special occasions.  With its unlined full cup and luxurious charmeuse in the upper cup, it will lift and provide stability, also for the heavier bust. At the same time, it gives the bust a natural round shape without increasing the volume. The underwire separates the bust and keeps it in place. Padded comfort straps relieve the shoulders to keep you comfortable all day without red marks or chafing. The bra is made of polyamide, elastane and polyester, a soft and stable fabric with a luxury feeling.  Miss Mary knows that every body is unique and everyone deserves to feel beautiful, so we provide our bras in a wide range of sizes. Our expert patternmakers test each size and style extensively, so you can be sure that our bras look fabulous on big and small chests. Miss Mary of Sweden has been operating since 1957, and with more than 60 years in the business, we have never stopped striving to provide our customers with only the best.
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "10.63 x 8.66 x 0.79 inches; 2.82 Ounces", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "December 15, 2020"}
